resources.name: Bridgeway Behavioral Health

location.address: Lincoln and St. Charles Counties, MO

resources.details: Provides emergency shelter, therapy, and support services for women and children experiencing intimate partner violence, including provision of personal hygiene items and emergency clothing.

resources.name: Turning Point
resources.details: Offers community-based shelter with counseling, case management, referrals, support groups, and life skills classes for survivors of abuse and their children.

resources.name: Halo Home
resources.details: Provides long-term shelter and emergency housing with counseling, medical checkups, tutoring, and professional development for high-risk youth.

resources.name: On-Time Ministries
resources.details: Offers residential housing, counseling, healthcare access, job training, and education for adult women survivors of human trafficking.

resources.name: Saint Marthaâ€™s Hall

location.address: Undisclosed location, serves all counties in MO

resources.details: Provides shelter, meals, personal hygiene items, emergency clothing, school supplies, and support services for women and children experiencing intimate partner violence.

resources.name: Bread of Life
resources.details: Offers food distribution on Wednesdays with additional Salvation Army services on Tuesdays. Photo ID is required.

resources.name: Warrenton Job Center
resources.details: Assists with job readiness, resume building, interview preparation, job placements, and supports employment initiatives for veterans and youth.

resources.name: The Child Center, Inc - Hannibal
resources.details: Provides child-focused legal services including forensic interviews, advocacy, therapeutic services, and sexual abuse forensic exams.
